author: Michael Rapoport
title: Icahn Fights Attempt to Take AmTrust Financial Services Private
text:
Activist investor Carl Icahn is contesting an attempt by the primary owners of AmTrust Financial Services Inc. to take the company private, saying the company hasn’t treated its public shareholders fairly.
In a letter to AmTrust’s board Thursday, Mr. Icahn said the Karfunkel and Zyskind families, which control the New York company, are “blatantly taking advantage” of its minority shareholders.
